plot: Sacristán has observed since childhood injustices that happen in their small town. One day tired of the dictatorship established he decides to act. His son, Ricardo, in love with the daughter of the mayor decides to run away with her.
title: Sacristán
plot_es: Sacristán has observed since childhood injustices that happen in their small town. One day tired of the dictatorship established he decides to act. His son, Ricardo, in love with the daughter of the mayor decides to run away with her.
